steps.task: Roll out the chilled pastry and line a 20cm tart tin.
Prick the bottom of the pastry case, line with foil and pour in baking beans. Blind bake for 15-20 mins
Take out of the oven and remove the beans. If the base is still soggy return to the overn and bake for another 5 mins.
While the case is baking prepare the filling: grate the lemons lightly to remove the zest and reserve.
Juice the lemons, then whisk the juice in a bowl with the eggs and sugar to combine.
Put the butter and lemon zest in a heavy pan, add the egg mixture and cook over a low heat, stirring constantly until you have a thick custard. This will take about 15 mins.
The curd needs no further cooking. Allow to cool slightly, then pur or spoon into the pastry case. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
